activities: Squarespace provides subscription software for publishing websites, domain name registration, and related online website building tools. Squarespace uses personal information for billing, customer service communications, operating, developing, and improving the services, marketing (with clear opt-out provisions), and human resources functions. Squarespace's Privacy Policy describes what, why, and when personal information is received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. Squarespace's employee policies describe the choices and policies for Squarespace Ireland Ltd. employees regarding their personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline customer and employee data which may be manually processed
